Quick search

Script: run_continuum_validation¶

This script executes the continuum QA. By default, it is executed as part of the pipeline QA, but can be run independently.

Note: PyBDSF can take a long time to run if the image quality is bad.

Reference¶

This script contains functionality to run pybdsf on continuum data for the QA

It does can run on a single image for the mosaic QA or an observation number alone for the continuum QA. In the latter case, it will go through all the beams.
